title: Refunding problem
body: Hey i just started playing league a few months ago i paid for some RP in order to get the champs i planed to use , and i just discovered the refund option , however the only champion that i wanted to refund its "not refundable" because i rolled a skin for him that i dont want (Lucian) but im unable to refund him,  is it possible to refund him by an admin? if so thanks in advance!

replies.body: We'd be happy to look into this for you!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can help.  In the meantime, go over our [refund](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) guidelines to make sure that it's eligible- within 90 days, etc.  We'll respond as soon as possible!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5YrYPjPb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-10T18:42:10.465+0000)
>
> We'd be happy to look into this for you!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can help.  In the meantime, go over our [refund](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) guidelines to make sure that it's eligible- within 90 days, etc.  We'll respond as soon as possible!



thank you , i just sent a ticket  , and yes i have 2 remaining refunds Purchase was made in 6/13/16 (i purchased another two in the same date and are able to refund)
